This place was recommended by the concierge desk at the Hotel Arts.  It was a Sunday night and many places were closed. Very cool restaurant decor. The entrance is very well decorated and gives the restaurant a trendy feel.  Once inside it opens up to a multi level restaurant with great views. We were greeted by our waiter and assistant who were both very well dressed.  Their specialities is seafood and a great appetizer was the  sea snails. Grilled turbot was top notch.  A cup of espresso to finish it off to complete a great dinner.  This place was a great find!  Thanks to the concierge at Hotel Arts for a great recommendation.
